description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 21-24 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; last two leaves are replacements. Back cover detached. Marginal damp staining. Origin: 18th century? Incipit: اللهم اني احمدك ... وبعد فان الالتفات
author: Aʻraj, ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Muḥammad, 1282-1353?
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillīʼs Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl.
extent: 235 leaves : paper ; 206 x 147 (162 x 105) mm bound to 210 x 149 mm
title: Munyat al-labīb fī sharḥ Tahdhīb al-uṣūl lil-ʻAllāmah al-Ḥillī
creator: اعرج، عبد المطلب بن محمد، 1282-1353?
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl.
binding_note: Full maroon leather with gold-stamped central mandorla and pendants and blind-stamped fillets; blue paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
